name: poison-touch

effect.black-white: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit. This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust. This ability takes effect before mummy.
effect.black-2-white-2: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit. This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust. This ability takes effect before mummy.

short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.

flavor_text.black-white: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
